look for that, it might be like this:

	    if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 2) {

change the 2, to a 0. it should then look like this:

	    if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 0) {

item.title: How do i make an all pickup server?
item.dc:creator: @Fatal_Desire Fatal Desire
item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

  1. Go to your client.java and search “pickup” (Without the quotations)

  2. Beside it find, player rights and look for a number.

  3. Change the number to 0.

  4. Save, Compile, and Run.

  5. Then your done!

(REPLY IF IT HELPED)

Read full topic
